jd: From: Ashok, Biztegy Analytics, Inc ashok@ba-itconsult.com Reply to: ashok@ba-itconsult.com Hi, Location: Durham, NCClient: TSG/Duke University Health SystemTECHNICAL BUSINESS SYSTEMS ANALYST | REMOTE (EST)The Select Group is looking for a talented Business Systems Analyst to join one of our top healthcare partners. This person will be joining their Data Partnership Team that focuses on IT Service Management, system compliance, and platform lifecycle management of the personalized health system data lake. This person will help drive the sourcing of the data into the different platforms by utilizing their skills with SQL, Waterfall/Agile and documentation while being detail and process-oriented.TECHNICAL BUSINESS SYSTEMS ANALYST REQUIREMENTS5+ years of Business Systems Analyst experienceExperience within Healthcare ITWorking knowledge of SQL and experience working with different RDBMSsAble to read scripting language for PythonUnderstanding of agile environment/scrum frameworkExperience creating system documentation, release notes, and testing documentationExperience performing root cause analysis on internal and external processesTECHNICAL BUSINESS SYSTEMS ANALYST RESPONSIBILITIESDocument all platforms and configurations and execute system reviews and test plansEvaluate the clinical systems that hold data and work with the application owners and solutions architects to design and document the data flowsTranslate service requests and incidents entered by the partners—also track the work items to completionManage change request through the change management processSupport the QA team to ensure high quality products are delivered
